verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stock markets] [V: drop] [ARGM-LOC: following wall street] selloff charts for the entire region were awash in red but the declines were mostly in the 2 percent to 3 percent range india irobot new york mercantile exchange japan russell asia amazoncom new york brent crude south korea francis lun stock geo securities stephen innes u s cathay pacific chief investment officer amazon china at&t america united parcel service analyst bangkok boeing netflix wells fargo private bank manhattan att erik davidson hong kong
